titles: The vvittie faire one· A comedie. As it was presented at the Private House in Drury Lane. By her Maiesties Servants. By Iames Shirley.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Wil. Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop, neere Furnivals-Inne Gate, in Holborne,
notes: Running title reads: The witty faire one.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
